refsect1.programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o insremot.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> nchnls = 1
insremot "192.168.1.100", "192.168.1.101", 1
instr 1 aq barmodel 1, 1, p4, 0.001, 0.23, 5, p5, p6, p7 out aq endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> f0 360
e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
